children.author: thisistoohard
children.comment: What do you do? Also given my limited knowledge I can't imagine why you'd want Indianapolis over Florida but I'm Canadian so I really just
I've been up here for a year for work, but I'm moving back down home for (hopefully) the interim for a different job.
Just visiting Indianapolis?
Well it seems we're getting along reasonably well now, but yes it's a shame. Though we're closer than if I was home in South Florida haha
I'm near Toronto. That's too bad given my "thisistoohard" username represents how hard it is to find a username, so we may get along! maybe.
Early evening drunk & recovering. Given our timezone spans a vast distance, it's doubtful we're nearby (though I'm in Indianapolis).
Same time zone then! Soo day drunk? Or just early evening drunk and recovering? It was a gorgeous day if you are from anywhere near me!
I believe we are in the same/near the same timezone, it's a quarter til 1AM here.
Day drunk or different time zone? It's midnight ish here.
That is fine, I myself am coming off of a period of intoxication.
Also meant "so maybe that.." I may or may not be drunk.
